entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023
